00017 #include "MisrCoordQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include "misrproj.h"
00020 
00039 MTKt_status MtkBlsToLatLonAry(
00040   int path,              
00041   int resolution_meters, 
00042   int nelement,          
00043   const int *block,      
00044   const float *line,     
00045   const float *sample,   
00046   double *lat_dd,        
00047   double *lon_dd          )
00048 {
00049   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00050   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00051   double som_x;         /* SOM X */
00052   double som_y;         /* SOM Y */
00053   int i;            /* Loop index */
00054 
00055   if (block == NULL || line == NULL || sample == NULL ||
00056       lat_dd == NULL || lon_dd == NULL)
00057     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00058 
00059   if (nelement < 0)
00060     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00061 
00062   for (i = 0; i < nelement; i++) {
00063     status = MtkBlsToSomXY(path, resolution_meters,
00064                block[i], line[i], sample[i], &som_x, &som_y);
00065     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00066 
00067     status = MtkSomXYToLatLon(path, som_x, som_y, &lat_dd[i], &lon_dd[i]);
00068     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00069   }
00070 
00071   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00072 
00073 ERROR_HANDLE:
00074   return status_code;
00075 }
